attributes.action: require warning labels on products containing unsustainably caught Fish
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The world is quickly running out of Fish. Our oceans are dying. Governments must act now. 

We believe consumers should be aware of the environmental impact of purchasing products containing unsustainably caught fish, including farmed fish. 

Any product containing fish not certified by Marine Stewardship Council (MSC) should have the warning.
